Description: * Respawn time at 19 minutes reduced from 35s to 30s
* Respawn time at 30 minutes reduced from 75s to 70s

* You now have a longer respawn time if you die and are meaningfully richer than the enemy team's average net worth (scales from +6s to +22s penalty, based on networth being 15 to 30% higher and game time being 10min to 25min, if under 15% NW or 10min, nothing happens)
* {{PageRef|Denizen|alt_name=Neutral}} respawn times, hp, and bounty reduced by 30% ({{PageRef|Sinner's Sacrifice|alt_name=sinner's sacrifice}} unaffected)
* {{PageRef|Soul Urn|alt_name=Urn}} no longer requires a drop off channel time
* {{PageRef|Soul Urn|alt_name=Urn}} is now knocked out of your hands with a {{PageRef|Light Melee|alt_name=light melee}} (instead of only with a {{PageRef|Heavy Melee|alt_name=heavy melee}})
* {{PageRef|Soul Urn|alt_name=Urn}} pickup channel time is reset if you get hit with a light or {{PageRef|Heavy Melee|alt_name=heavy melee}}
* Can no longer {{PageRef|Parry|alt_name=parry}} while channeling to pickup the {{PageRef|Soul Urn|alt_name=urn}}
* {{PageRef|Soul Urn|alt_name=Urn}} carrier resist reduced from 50% to 30%
* Down Dash stamina cost reduced from 1 to 0.5
* Stamina Regen in the healing zone is now dramatically increased
* {{PageRef|Kinetic Dash}}: Ammo count reduced from +8 to +6
* {{PageRef|Soul Urn|alt_name=Urn}} now drops if it travels through doorman portals
